hadith.chapterTitle: Excellence of the Morning (Fajr) and 'Asr Prayers
hadith.body:
Abu Musa (May Allah be pleased with him) reported: Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said, "He who The observes Al-Bardan (i.e., Fajr and 'Asr prayers) will enter Jannah."

[Al-Bukhari and Muslim].
- عن أبي موسى رضي الله عنه أن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم قال‏:‏‏"‏من صلى البردين دخل الجنة‏"‏ ‏(‏‏(‏متفق عليه‏)‏‏)‏‏.‏
